div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 07:52 am CDT

div.div: A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly after 2pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 63. Windy, with a north wind 22 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.
A 10 percent chance of showers before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 39. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 17 to 22 mph decreasing to 8 to 13 mph after midnight.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. North northwest wind 5 to 11 mph.

div.p:
Fowler School District
A Gemini School
Where Education is Experienced
Fowler School District 225 has been successfully implementing policies, plans and procedures that are in line with the Kansas State Department of Education's Vision Statement, “Kansas Leads the World in the Success of Each Student.” The school board, administration and teachers have . . .
